com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.fileUtils

类 FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.commonUtils.fileUtils.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    To do something with file,like reading ,writing etc.

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                java.lang.String content,
                boolean append)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        If append is true and the file already exists, it will be appended to; otherwise it will be truncated. The file will be created if it does not exist.
        参数:
        filePath -
        content -
        append - Indicates whether or not to append to an existing file.
        返回:
        return false if content is empty, true otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileWriter
        java.io.IOException

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                java.lang.String content)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        If the file already exists, it will be truncated. The file will be created if it does not exist.
        参数:
        filePath -
        content -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                java.io.InputStream stream,
                boolean append)
        write file
        参数:
        filePath - the file to be opened for writing.
        stream - the input stream
        append - if true, then bytes will be written to the end of the file rather than the beginning
        返回:
        return true
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileOutputStream

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.io.File file,
                java.io.InputStream stream)
        write file, the bytes will be written to the begin of the file
        参数:
        file -
        stream -
        返回:
        另请参阅:
        #writeFile(java.io.File, java.io.InputStream, boolean)}

        stream - the input stream
        append - if true, then bytes will be written to the end of the file rather than the beginning
        返回:
